document.heading: District of Columbia Public Assistance Act of 1982 Temporary Amendments Act of 1984

history.narrative: Law 5-150, the “District of Columbia Public Assistance Act of 1982 Temporary Amendments Act of 1984,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-530, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 23, 1984, and November 7, 1984, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 29, 1984, it was assigned Act No. 5-214 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
